alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, northeastern McNairy, northwestern Hardin and northeastern Chester Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacks Creek, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Henderson, Sardis, Jacks Creek, Reagan, Milledgeville, Enville, Palestine, Hinkle, Roby, Cabo, Middle Fork and Five Forks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
